Package Controller

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomerController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddCustomerController, ModifyCustomerController
public class CustomerController extends Object
Generic controller class for add customer and modify customer views

    • countryComboBox

      protected javafx.scene.control.ComboBox countryComboBox
      The user uses this ComboBox to select the Country that the Customer resides in. On selection, the Division ID ComboBox will populate with all the provinces or states in the selected country.

    • divisionIdComboBox

      protected javafx.scene.control.ComboBox divisionIdComboBox
      The user uses this ComboBox to select the province or state the Customer will be in after they select a Country from the countryComboBox

  • Constructor Details

      public CustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • onCountrySelected

      public void onCountrySelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Called when the user selects a country from the Country ComboBox. This will reset the provinces or states in the Province Division combo box such that they are all within the selected country.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - not used
      Throws:
      IOException - - throws if there is an issue with a string in a ComboBox
      SQLException - - throws if there is an issue pulling countries from the database

    • onOkButton

      public boolean onOkButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Called after the user clicks the Ok. On click the function checks all the fields in Add Customer view to make sure that they are valid and that they are not empty.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - not used
      Returns:
      true if user input is good, false if user input was invalid
      Throws:
      IOException - - throws an exception is main.fxml cannot be found or loaded when returning to the main view
      SQLException - - throws an exception if there is an error inserting the new Customer into the database

    • onCancelButton

      public void onCancelButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Called after the user clicks the Cancel button. On click it closes the Add/Modify Customer view and returns to the main application view with the Customers and the Appointments tables.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - not used.
      Throws:
      IOException - - throws an exception if main.fxml cannot be found or loaded
